name: Presidio Middle School
description: School Type: Middle School Serves grades: 6, 7, 8 Uniform Policy: No uniforms, except for PE. School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper Languages: Japanese World Language, Vietnamese World Language Presidio Middle School has a multicultural population of diverse socioeconomic backgrounds. We are committed to delivering a standards-based education of highest quality to all students.
